text: The 1982 World Karate Championships are the 6th edition of the World Karate Championships, and were held in Taipei, Taiwan from November 21 to 25 November 1982. ==Medalists== ===Men=== {| |- |rowspan=2|Individual kata |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2|Kumite −60 kg |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2|Kumite −65 kg |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2|Kumite −70 kg |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2|Kumite −75 kg |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2|Kumite −80 kg |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2|Kumite +80 kg |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2|Kumite open |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2|Team kumite |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |} ===Women=== {| |- |rowspan=2|Individual kata |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2|Kumite −53 kg |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2|Kumite −60 kg |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |- |rowspan=2|Kumite +60 kg |rowspan=2| |rowspan=2| | |- | |} ==Medal table== ==References== ==External links== * World Karate Federation * Results * Report World Karate Championships Category:1982 in Taiwanese sport Category:World Karate Championships Category:International sports competitions hosted by Taiwan Karate Championships Category:Karate competitions in Taiwan Category:20th century in Taipei
title: 1982 World Karate Championships
